name: Advanced FFmpeg Configuration Examples
description: Various FFmpeg configurations for different use cases

telegram_optimized.command: ffmpeg -i input.mp4 -c:v libx264 -c:a aac -preset fast -movflags +faststart -y output.mp4

high_quality.command: ffmpeg -i input.mp4 -c:v libx264 -c:a aac -preset slow -crf 18 -movflags +faststart -y output.mp4

low_bandwidth.command: ffmpeg -i input.mp4 -c:v libx264 -c:a aac -preset fast -crf 28 -b:a 96k -movflags +faststart -vf scale=854:480 -y output.mp4

mobile_friendly.command: ffmpeg -i input.mp4 -c:v libx264 -c:a aac -preset medium -crf 23 -maxrate 1M -bufsize 2M -movflags +faststart -vf scale=1280:720 -y output.mp4

streaming_requirements: Send as video type, not document

no_streaming.problem: Video uploads but won't stream inline
no_streaming.solution: Ensure -movflags +faststart is used and sent as video type

large_file.solution: Increase compression with higher CRF value or reduce resolution

incompatible_codec.problem: Video won't play on some devices
incompatible_codec.solution: Use H.264/AAC codecs with baseline profile
